TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelSender implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel

summary.span: 提供寄件者通道所需的函式和屬性。

span.span: Provides required functions and properties for the sender channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道的傳送端必須公開介面。The sending side of channels must expose the interface. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/CPP/ichannelsender_2_client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/CS/ichannelsender_2_client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/VB/ichannelsender_2_client.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink CreateMessageSink (string url, object remoteChannelData, out string objectURI);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink CreateMessageSink(string url, object remoteChannelData, [out] string& objectURI) cil managed
Public Function CreateMessageSink (url As String, remoteChannelData As Object, ByRef objectURI As String) As IMessageSink
public: System::Runtime::Remoting::Messaging::IMessageSink ^ CreateMessageSink(System::String ^ url, System::Object ^ remoteChannelData, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % objectURI);

param.name: url
param.span: 新接收應該將訊息傳遞至的 URL。

span.span: The URL to which the new sink will deliver messages.

param.name: remoteChannelData
param.span: 遠端主機的通道資料物件，新接收應該將訊息傳遞至遠端主機。

span.span: The channel data object of the remote host to which the new sink will deliver messages.

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，包含新通道訊息接收的 URI，此 URI 傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

summary.span: 傳回通道訊息接收，其傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 將訊息傳遞至指定 URL 的頻道訊息接收、頻道資料物件或 (如果頻道無法連接至指定的端點)。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object, or if the channel cannot connect to the given endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回將訊息傳遞至指定的 URL 或通道資料物件的通道訊息接收。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果`uri`參數是`null`、`remoteChannelData`接收使用參數做為目標。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, the `remoteChannelData` parameter is used as a target for the sink. 任一`url`參數或`remoteChannelData`參數可以是`null`，但非兩者。Either the `url` parameter or the `remoteChannelData` parameter can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/CPP/ichannelsender_2_client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/CS/ichannelsender_2_client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/VB/ichannelsender_2_client.vb#1)]

exception.span: 立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構使用權限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

permission.span: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。
